sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import "./TermsAndConditions.css"; const TermsAndConditions = () => { return (

Quik Chefs

1. Introduction

Welcome to Quik Chefs. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with these terms.

2. Services Offered

Quik Chefs provides culinary staffing and hospitality services. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service at any time without prior notice.

3. User Responsibilities

Users are responsible for providing accurate information when making inquiries or bookings. You agree not to use our services for any unlawful purpose.

4. Payment Terms

All payments for services must be made in accordance with the payment terms outlined at the time of booking. Late payments may incur additional fees.

5. Cancellation Policy

Clients may cancel services with a written notice. Cancellation fees may apply depending on the timing of the cancellation.

6. Limitation of Liability

Quik Chefs is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

7. Governing Law

These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of India.

8. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. Users are encouraged to review these terms periodically for any changes.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
